guid.comments: string. guid, unique only within the mod. Will be turned into GUID 'mod:'+$yourModId+':'+$guid
name: The Void
name.comments: string. Name for the terrain, will be shown to the user (non localized)
tileSprites.comments: List<string>. List of file names, local to the mod folder. One file per tile variation. Need at least one.

movementCost.timeOfDay.comments: TimeOfDay::GUID. Time of day the following data applies to.
movementCost.allowMovement.comments: (Optional) bool [default=true]. Set to false to permanently disable movement onto this terrain type (ex: mountain)
movementCost.cost.comments: int >= 0. Cost to enter this terrain. Ignored when 'allowMovement' is false.
